drop_confirm.confirmation: Press %s again to drop this item.
drop_confirm.midnightconfig.confirmation: The amount of time in seconds before the confirmation status is reset.
drop_confirm.midnightconfig.playSounds.t: Whether DropConfirm should play sounds for various events.
drop_confirm.midnightconfig.treatAsWhite:
Whether the blacklist should be used as a whitelist.

NOTE: This change takes effect instantly, but will only show visually upon re-entering the config screen.
drop_confirm.midnightconfig.blacklistedI: Items that should be ignored by DropConfirm.
drop_confirm.midnightconfig.whitelistedI: Items that should not be ignored by DropConfirm.
